1.0.0.name: wordpress/discussit-comments
1.0.0.description:
Enrich your WordPress website with a top-notch comment system at the bottom of your posts. DiscussIt Comments will replace WordPress comments and let your reader’s community comment on articles, reviews, recipes, and simply engage in discussions about anything. Boost your social presence by letting your visitors share comments with their friends on Facebook and Twitter. DiscussIt Comments are visible to Google and are proven to improve your SEO.

It’s your website, so you have complete control over content and appearance including automatic tools to mimic your site’s design and detect SPAM (yes, we use Akismet too!).

DiscussIt Comments has proven to increase website traffic and visitor engagement, to prolong visit time and to significantly promote your website in search engines and social networks (Facebook, Twitter).

Real-time commenting notifies participants about content updates so they respond to each other instantly. Our intelligent comm
